meanings.definition: To make something illegal by law.
meanings.sent1: The new law criminalizes texting while driving.
meanings.sent2: The government criminalizes stealing to protect people.
meanings.sent3: It criminalizes jaywalking, so be careful crossing the street!
meanings.sent4: His strict parenting style criminalizes any form of disobedience.
meanings.sent5: The sign clearly criminalizes littering in the park.

meanings.definition: To declare an action or behavior as a crime.
meanings.sent1: The judge criminalizes fraud in all its forms.
meanings.sent2: Society criminalizes violence to maintain peace.
meanings.sent3: The teacher criminalizes cheating on tests to ensure fairness.
meanings.sent4: Her strict rules criminalize any form of disrespect in the classroom.
meanings.sent5: The law criminalizes discrimination based on race.
